column3: While you are on it, can you perhaps also change my "hotfixes" for getXYZAction into Qt signals :)?\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/7e600cd92d2e6991afe26b19d9ad576a251350b9 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK for the current version :), I compiled and tested it.\n
